summary: This code uses ADB to simulate touch events on an Android device. It performs a power button press, a swipe gesture, enters text, and presses the back key.

details.comment: This code uses ADB to simulate touch events on an Android device. It performs a power button press, a swipe gesture, enters text, and presses the back key.
details.content:
adb -s 192.168.10.3:5555 shell input keyevent 26
adb -s 192.168.10.3:5555 shell input swipe 500 500 500 0
adb -s 192.168.10.3:5555 shell input text "Bumper\&Mountains"
adb -s 192.168.10.3:5555 shell input keyevent 66
